      • reset

        void reset()
        This may not be supported so far
        Specified by:

      • getModem

        Modem getModem()
        Modem is interface for a ROS/Nengo modem
        Returns:
        modem (ROS node) of this ModemContainer

      • setModem

        void setModem(Modem myModem)
        Set modem to this ModemContainer
        Parameters:
        myModem - modem to be used

      • getConnectedNode

        org.ros.node.ConnectedNode getConnectedNode()
                                            throws ConnectionException
        The most important method is getConnectedNode(), which provides factory for ROS publishers/subscribers, this factory is used by coders/decoders to create own origins/ terminations. In order to obtain ConnectedNode, the modem has to be already launched.
        Returns:
        factory for ROS publishers/subscribers
        Throws:
        ConnectionException

      • resetModem

        void resetModem()
        This calls (typical Nengo method) reset on modem in the container. This method should call myGroup.reset() method, which resets all nodes in the group, including this one

      • getMyGroup

        NodeGroup getMyGroup()
        In case that someone would like to access to group data (e.g. vivae agents)
        Returns:
        group that I belong to

      • getConfiguration

        @Deprecated
org.ros.node.NodeConfiguration getConfiguration()
        Deprecated. 
        Configuration which launches the node (name, namespace..)
        Returns:
        node cofiguration of the launched Modem
